game.name: Jigsaw Puzzle Hawaii
game.description:
Hawaii is a beautiful place to visit during your vacant time. So, you made out a plan to go there and visited to some of its major attractions. Luckily, your trip was awesome and you captured 16 stunning images of this paradise. All your images were worth watching. Everything was good, but a tragedy took place with you while returning from this hot tourist destination. All your images were torn out and now you want to arrange them and make them like before. Join Jigsaw Puzzle Hawaii and get ready to rearrange all the 16 images as fast as you can!

This brand new arcade challenge is meant for players of all ages. Choose the puzzle size and then select the image! When you click the play button, you would have three image options including 6X5, 8X6 and 12X10 to choose from. In each mode, there are 16 amazing pictures to enjoy with. Of course, the difficulty level will keep increasing as you advance in the game. In 6X5 mode, you would have lesser pictures to arrange as compared to the ones you find in 12X10 modes. 

Track time at the right bottom of the screen and know how much time you have taken to complete a puzzle! In case of being confused or finding difficulty during the gameplay, you can click on the eye button anytime to see the actual look of your current image in this HTML5 puzzle challenge. Rearrange all the pieces together by just clicking the shuffle button! The minimum time you will take to complete the puzzle, the higher stars you will obtain in the end. All the best to solve out all the puzzles to score higher in each mode!
